ERRORS.BAD_DATE_INTERVAL: Incorrect date interval.  Please check that both fields are filled out in the correct order.
ERRORS.BAD_REQUEST: You are not allowed to perform this operation
ERRORS.ERR_INTERNET_DISCONNECTED: You are not connected to the network.
ERRORS.HOLIDAY_NESTED: The vacation period defined for this employee is nested with another period
ERRORS.EVERYTHING_BAD: An error occurred during the operation
ERRORS.MISSING_INVENTORY_ACCOUNTS: Some selected inventories don't have stock accounts associated
ERRORS.NO_FISCAL_YEAR: You are missing a fiscal year for that date!
ERRORS.NOT_ALLOWED: You are not allowed to perform this action
ERRORS.NOT_A_NUMBER: You did not provide a number to a field intended for a number
ERRORS.NOT_A_TEXT: You did not provide valid text in a text field
ERRORS.NOT_FOUND: This record could not be found
ERRORS.NO_PERMISSIONS: The login succeeded, but you have no permissions. Please see a system administrator.
ERRORS.NO_PROJECT: No permissions for that project.  Please see a system administrator
ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED: You have submitted a bad username or password combination.  Please login in with valid credentials to continue.
ERRORS.ER_DUP_KEY: A key collided in a unique database field.  Please retry your action.  If the problem persists, contact the developers.
ERRORS.ER_DUP_ENTRY: You have duplicated a value in a unique field!  Please make sure that the necessary values are unique.
ERRORS.ER_DUP_PURCHASE_ORDER_ITEM: You have duplicate items for an inventory item (shown in red).  Please delete it and update the previous item with that inventory item.
ERRORS.ER_STOCK_LOT_IS_EXPIRED: Stock lot '{{label}}' cannot be selected because it is expired
ERRORS.ER_BAD_FIELD_ERROR: Column does not exist in database.
ERRORS.ER_ROW_IS_REFERENCED: Cannot delete entity because entity is used in another table.
ERRORS.ER_ROW_IS_REFERENCED_2: Cannot delete entity because entity is used in another table.
ERRORS.ER_PREVENT_NEGATIVE_QUANTITY_IN_ADJUSTME: This stock adjustement will overconsume the quantity in stock and generate negative quantity in stock
ERRORS.ER_PREVENT_NEGATIVE_QUANTITY_IN_AGGREGAT: This aggregate stock consumption will overconsume the quantity in stock and generate negative quantity in stock
ERRORS.ER_PREVENT_NEGATIVE_QUANTITY_IN_EXIT_STO: This stock exit will overconsume the quantity in stock and generate negative quantity in stock
ERRORS.ER_BAD_NULL_ERROR: A column was left NULL that cannot be NULL.
ERRORS.ER_PARSE_ERROR: Your request could not  be translated into valid SQL.  Please modify your request and try again.
ERRORS.ER_EMPTY_QUERY: Your request seems empty. Are you sure you filled everything in?
ERRORS.ER_NO_DEFAULT_FOR_FIELD: You did not include enough information in your submission!  Please check your errors and try again.
ERRORS.ER_DATA_TOO_LONG: One of your form values is too long! Please shorten it and resubmit.
ERRORS.NO_NEXT_FISCAL_YEAR: Fiscal years can only be closed into a subsequent year.  Please open a new year before closing this one.
ERRORS.MISSING_UPLOAD_FILES: You have not selected any files to upload.  Please choose one or more files to upload.
ERRORS.NOT_BEGINING_FISCAL_YEAR: The fiscal year selected is not a begining fiscal year
ERRORS.ER_DUPLICATED_LOT: A lot has been selected more than one time
ERRORS.ER_TOO_BIG_SET: Too many strings for column %s and SET
ERRORS.ER_TOO_LONG_STRING: Result string is longer than 'max allowed packet' bytes
ERRORS.ER_TOO_BIG_PRECISION: Too big precision specified for the column.
ERRORS.ER_FK_COLUMN_NOT_NULL: The foreign key should not be null
ERRORS.ER_ACCESS_DENIED_ERROR: Access denied for the current user
